title: Andangkaka Song Lyrics Anniyan
stanzas:
pooval oru podu pottaa
saiva kaattum vettakkaari

kadhal pachondhi
iravil pochaandi
pachcha thanniya
oththa paarvaiyil
paththa vachchaandi

hey thaandi kudi thaandi
un thaavani thottendi
muththaale vervai ellaam
suththam seyyendi

ye chi vaa endru yeval seivaayo
ha hmm hey endru koova seivaayaa
inji mmorappaa iduppa paarthu
kasangi ponendi
eera udhatula soodu parappi
ishthri poden di

appa romba body kaaren
randakka randakka
randakka randakka

unna theekkadiyil
ilai pola nenachen
unna naakkadiyil
karkandaaga olichen

Maa paa vazhai
mukkani neeyo
saa boo three pottu
saappuduveno

isakki kada pisuru mittaaye
tentu kotta interval unake

sutta paal pola dhegam
thaandi unaku (2)
adhil paalaadai mattum
konjam velakku (2)

pooval oru podu pottaa
saiva kaattum vettakkaari

kadhal pachondhi
iravil pochaandi
pachcha thanniya
oththa paarvaiyil
paththa vachchaandi

hey thaandi kudi thaandi
un thaavani thottendi
muththaale vervai ellaam
suththam seyyendi

seo.title: Andangkaka Song Lyrics Anniyan
seo.description: Get the complete Andangkaka Song Lyrics Anniyan from Anniyan. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and sung by Jassie Gift. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Anniyan, Jassie Gift, KK, Saindhavi, Shreya Goshal, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
